## üé¨ About Crescent Moon

Crescent Moon isn't just a website ‚Äî it's a **journey through stories** from galaxies near and far. Whether you're into deep space thrillers or slice-of-life anime, we have something for every stargazer. üåôüì∫

‚ú® Built with love, curiosity, and a sprinkle of cosmic dust.

---

## üöÄ Features That Shine

‚ú® **Trending Now** ‚Äì See what‚Äôs blazing hot in the cosmos  
üéØ **Continue Watching** ‚Äì Because your space travel shouldn't reset  
üîç **Smart Search** ‚Äì Find what you love, faster than light  
üé® **Genre Filter** ‚Äì From sci-fi to rom-coms, it‚Äôs all here  
üì± **Mobile Friendly** ‚Äì Explore on phone, tablet, or holodeck  
üåå **Smooth UI** ‚Äì Minimal, elegant, and easy on the eyes

## üîß Local Setup

Wanna run Crescent Moon on your own planet? Here‚Äôs how:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/yourusername/crescent-moon.git
cd crescent-moon
# Open index.html in your browser
